thread.title: Kids Stay, Play, and Eat Free in Hawaii at Aston Hotels
thread.title_full: Kids Stay, Play, and Eat Free in Hawaii at Aston Hotels

title: Kids Stay, Play, and Eat Free in Hawaii at Aston Hotels
text:
Home > Hotel Deals > Kids Stay, Play, and Eat Free in Hawaii at Aston Hotels Kids Stay, Play, and Eat Free in Hawaii at Aston Hotels by Patricia Magaña , SmarterTravel Staff - September 9, 2015 at 3:08 PM Tweet 
The "Kids Stay, Play, and Eat Free" deal from Aston Hotels makes saving money on your family vacation a cinch. 
Children 17 and younger stay free with their parents when using the existing bedding in rooms. Children 12 and under receive an Aston Kids Stay, Play, and Eat Free ID card when they check in. This card can be presented at participating shops, restaurants, and attractions for free offers and discounts. 
Participating properties include: Aston Aloha Beach Hotel, Kauai Aston Maui Lu Resort Aston Mahana at Kaanapali 
How to get this deal: For more information or to book, visit Aston's promo page . 
Don't forget: Always compare prices from multiple travel providers to make sure that you're getting the best price with this deal. Find Cheap Flights!
